siteMetadata.title: 国外股市热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览国外股票社区里的热门讨论

blogPost.title:
TD Ameritrade said it was restricting trading for GameStop, AMC and others amid a triple-digit percentage surge in the value of those companies in recent days. 

TD Ameritrade is "mitigating risk," a spokesperson told MarketWatch.  https://t.co/rT1NDaqncT https://t.co/BYeL91NXce
blogPost.author: MarketWatch

localize.full_text:
TD Ameritrade表示，由于GameStop、AMC等公司的价值在最近几天出现了三位数百分比的飙升，因此限制了这些公司的交易。

一位发言人告诉MarketWatch，TD Ameritrade正在 "减轻风险"。https://t.co/rT1NDaqncT https://t.co/BYeL91NXce。

TD Ameritrade表示，由於GameStop、AMC等公司的價值在最近幾天出現了三位數百分比的飆升，因此限制了這些公司的交易。

一位發言人告訴MarketWatch，TD Ameritrade正在 "減輕風險"。https://t.co/rT1NDaqncT https://t.co/BYeL91NXce。
